version_description:
+ Fixed: "weird effect when transitioning between main page and cheats."
+ Fixed: Rotating to landscape would drastically increase the font size.
+ Other misc. bug fixes/improvements.

+ Many corrections to Norwegian localisation, huge thanks to Thomas (Downcom) for these.

If you would like to help translate GTA Cheats into your language, or to see progress or submit corrections, head over to: http://thegtaplace.com/app/cheats/#translate

+ Improved the console selector when viewing cheats - Now it remembers which console/platform you last selected for each game so you don't have to switch to it every time you select that game.
+ Cheats for GTA III, Vice City and San Andreas now have separate pages for Xbox and Xbox 360 - this should help avoid confusion with the different controller layouts these consoles have.

+ GTA Cheats has now been translated into three more languages! Danish, Greek and Arabic
+ Fixed a couple of incorrect Finnish translations
+ Minor improvements to Dutch translation

If you would like to help translate GTA Cheats into your language, or to see progress or submit corrections, head over to: http://thegtaplace.com/app/cheats/#translate
We're especially looking for anyone who can help finish our SPANISH and ITALIAN translations.

+ Now available in 2 more languages: Serbian and Slovenian
+ Added Latin American variant of Spanish for Spanish users outside of Spain
+ Minor corrections to other languages

If you see any mistakes, or want to translate the app into a different language, you can help us! For details: http://thegtaplace.com/app/cheats/#translate

+ Now available in 2 more languages: Czech and Slovak
+ Minor corrections/bug fixes

If you see any mistakes, or want to translate the app into a different language, you can help us! For details: http://thegtaplace.com/app/cheats/#translate

+ iOS 8 compatibility including higher res logos for iPhone 6+
+ Logo grid now adapts better to your device/orientation, especially if you use your iPhone 6 or 6 Plus in landscape.
+ New translation added: Icelandic

NOTE for iOS 8 users:
iOS 8 has improved things for those of you who speak multiple languages. You can now change your order of preferred languages in Settings > General > Language & Region. From there you can add/remove and reorder any language in the world that you know. If GTA Cheats supports multiple languages you have listed here, it will use the one nearest the top, defaulting to English if none are supported. Thanks to the community, GTA Cheats is now available in 25 different languages!
-----
As always, you can help us translate by submitting new translations or helping to correct inaccurate ones on our translation site. For details please see: http://www.thegtaplace.com/app/cheats/#translate

• Updated some translations
• Optimisations to make the app size a little smaller
• Added the phone number versions of cheats for GTAV - these only work on the PS4, Xbox One and PC versions.
––– NOTE: Some numbers are still unknown - we'll add these in a future update when they're discovered.
––– NOTE 2: Phone numbers are NOT saved in the smartphone; you may find it easier to stick with the usual button cheats (they're the same as PS3/360 versions).

––––––––
Seen any missing/incorrect translations? Want to translate the app into another language? You can help us! For details please go to: http://www.thegtaplace.com/app/cheats/#translate

· Added one new translation: Hebrew
· Minor fixes
–––––––––––
Seen any missing/incorrect translations? Want to translate the app into another language? You can help us! For details please go to: http://www.thegtaplace.com/app/cheats/#translate

New:
◦ By popular demand, we've added the ability to change the language within the app
◦ Added Hungarian translation
◦ Added cell phone versions of the "explosive ammo" and "lower wanted level" cheats for GTA V.
◦ Added "special vehicles" spawn cheats for GTA V (PC, PS4, Xbox One) - these are for the "Dodo", "Kraken", and "Duke O'Death" vehicles.

Fixed:
◦ Typo in Invincibility cheat (cell phone version) for GTA V.

As always you can report bugs, suggestions and any other feedback to us on our Facebook or Twitter pages.

To help us with translations; by correcting mistakes, submitting missing translations, or translating into a language we don't support yet, please visit http://thegtaplace.com/app/cheats/#translate for more information.

2.1.11: Minor bug fix.

2.1.10:
New:
◦ By popular demand, we've added the ability to change the language within the app
◦ Added Hungarian translation
◦ Added cell phone versions of the "explosive ammo" and "lower wanted level" cheats for GTA V.
◦ Added "special vehicles" spawn cheats for GTA V (PC, PS4, Xbox One) - these are for the "Dodo", "Kraken", and "Duke O'Death" vehicles.

Fixed:
◦ Typo in Invincibility cheat (cell phone version) for GTA V.

As always you can report bugs, suggestions and any other feedback to us on our Facebook or Twitter pages.

To help us with translations; by correcting mistakes, submitting missing translations, or translating into a language we don't support yet, please visit http://thegtaplace.com/app/cheats/#translate for more information.

Just a little update to support some of the new features on the latest devices:
◦ Support for 3D Touch on iPhone 6s and 6s Plus lets you go straight to cheats for GTAV, GTAIV, GTASA or GTAVC by pressing on the app icon.
◦ Support for Split View on the iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4 and iPad Pro
◦ Support for Slide Over on iPad Airs, iPad minis and iPad Pro
◦ Removed official game logos by request.

********
As always, we're still open for anyone wishing to help us with translations; to correct mistakes, submit missing translations, or start translating into a language we don't support yet, please visit http://tgtap.com/translatecheats for more information.

Just a little update to support some of the new features on the latest devices:
◦ Support for 3D Touch on iPhone 6s and 6s Plus lets you go straight to cheats for GTAV, GTAIV, GTASA or GTAVC by pressing on the app icon.
◦ Support for Split View on the iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4 and iPad Pro
◦ Support for Slide Over on iPad Airs, iPad minis and iPad Pro
◦ Removed official game logos by request.

********
As always, we're still open for anyone wishing to help us with translations; to correct mistakes, submit missing translations, or start translating into a language we don't support yet, please visit http://tgtap.com/translatecheats for more information.

◦ The 5 remaining cheat codes have finally been discovered for PC (and PS4/XB1) versions of GTA V and are now included in the app
◦ Also added the newly discovered "Black Cellphones" code for GTA V (PC/PS4/XB1)
◦ Fixed a bug that may have caused a crash on certain iPads
◦ There is now a European Portuguese language option as well as Brazilian (note: some translations may still be using Brazilian spelling/grammar - see info below if you'd like to help us correct these)

********
As always, we're still open for anyone wishing to help us with translations; to correct mistakes, submit missing translations, or start translating into a language we don't support yet, please visit http://tgtap.com/translatecheats for more information.

********
NOTE: This will be the last version of the app to support iOS 6. If possible please update your devices to at least iOS 7 to continue receiving future updates.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

◦ Added a separate listing for San Andreas cheats for PS3 as they are slightly changed from the PS2 version
◦ Corrected/updated some translations

********
As always, we're still open for anyone wishing to help us with translations; to correct mistakes, submit missing translations, or start translating into a language we don't support yet, please visit http://tgtap.com/translatecheats for more information.
